# Non-Actionable Barriers {-}

```{r keyact, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
#| label: tbl-keyact
#| tbl-cap: "Priority barriers"
#| warning: false

library("flextable")

data <- read.csv("data/priority_barriers.csv", check.names=FALSE)
ft <- flextable(data)
ft <- bg(ft, bg = "#008270", part = "header")
ft <- color(ft, color = "white", part = "header")
ft <- set_caption(ft)
ft |> autofit() 
```
